title: Verify twitter is an option in the new campaign drop down for entitled users
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with a twitter entitled account
custom_steps:
When the user logs into campaign manager
And taps the new campaign button
custom_expected: Then the user will see 'Twitter' as one of the options in the drop down

title: Creating Campaign: tapping on twitter in new campaign brings up correct form
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with a twitter entitled account
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the new campaign button
And taps on twitter in the drop down
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the 'New Twitter Campaign' form
And there will be a 'Campaign Name' field that is a required field
And there will be a '# Tag' field that is a required field

title: Creating Campaign: fill out new twitter campaign form
custom_preconds:
Given the user has logged in with a twitter entitled account
And the user is on the 'New Twitter Campaign' form
custom_steps:
When the user enters in a valid campaign name
And enters in a valid hash tag
And taps the 'Create' button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be see the campaign page of the new twitter campaign
And the campaign will be already started

title: Creating Campaign: help links on the new twitter campaign form
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on the New Twitter Campaign form
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the 'Help' links next to Campaign Name
And # Tag
custom_expected: Then the appropriate message explaining each field will appear

title: Clone Campaign: Clone a twitter campaign
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on a twitter campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the Clone button at the top left
And enters in a new campaign name
And enters in a new # Tag
custom_expected: Then the user will be forwarded to the campaign page of the new cloned campaign

title: Expire Campaign: From campaign page - stopped campaign
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And there is a twitter campaign that is stopped
And the user is on the stopped twitter campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the Expire button in the top left
And taps on ok
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought back to the campaign page
And the campaign will be expired

title: Expire Campaign: From campaign page - running campaign
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with a twitter entitled account
And there is a twitter account that is currently running
And the user is on that twitter campaign page
custom_steps: When the user taps on the Expire button in the top left
custom_expected:
Then the user will see an error message:
"This campaign is currently running and cannot be expired:

title: Stopping Campaign: from campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with a twitter entitled account
And there is a twitter campaign currently running
And the user is on that running twitter campaign's page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the stop button
And taps on the 'OK' button
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the confirmation page saying "<campaign name> campaign has been stopped"
And if the user taps on the 'Click Here' like it will bring them back to the campaign page

title: Getting to pick twitter winner page
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on a running twitter campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the start of the running campaign in the Campaign Run Summary section
Or the user taps on the view link in the End Date column
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the Pick Twitter Winners page

title: Clicking the calendar should open up a calendar view to select a date and time.
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on the the pick twitter winners page
custom_steps: When the user taps on the calendar next to 'Pick Start Time' or 'Pick End Time'
custom_expected:
Then a calendar should appear
And the calendar next to the start time will have the start date and time already populated
And the calendar next to the end time will have the current date and time already populated

title: Clicking Clear Results will clear results from both get tweets and get counts
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on a running twitter campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on view in the campaign run summary
And taps on the clear results button
custom_expected: Then if the user attempts to get tweets it will not come up with any results

title: Verify that the Twitter tag field is a drop down box
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on a running twitter campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the start of the running campaign in the Campaign Run Summary section
And the user taps on the view link in the End Date column
And tape on the twitter tag drop down
custom_expected: Then all the possible tweets from previous twitter campaigns will be listed

title: Start time will automatically populated with the created time of the campaign
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on a running twitter campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the start of the running campaign in the Campaign Run Summary section
And the user taps on the view link in the End Date column
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the start time already populated
And the date and time will be the date and time of when the campaign was created

title: Leaving the end date blank will show an error.
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on a running twitter campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the start of the running campaign in the Campaign Run Summary section
And the user taps on the view link in the End Date column
And enters in search for
And enters in number of winners
And taps get tweets
custom_expected: Then the user will see an error "Please choose an end time"

title: When clicking on the date box, and the user clicks cancel - no date and time should be entered.
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on a running twitter campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the start of the running campaign in the Campaign Run Summary section
And the user taps on the view link in the End Date column
And the user taps on the calendar icon next to either the end time
And taps cancel
custom_expected: Then no date will be entered

title: Get tweets will throw an error if any field is left blank
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on a running twitter campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the start of the running campaign in the Campaign Run Summary section
And the user taps on the view link in the End Date column
And taps the get tweets button
custom_expected: Then the user will see errors under each empty field

title: If no results are found, 'No Records Found' will display
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on a running twitter campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the start of the running campaign in the Campaign Run Summary section
And the user taps on the view link in the End Date column
And fills in the required fields
And taps get tweets
custom_expected: Then if there are no results there will be a 'No Records Found'

title: Verify that if less tweets appear then entered in number of winners, that the number of tweets matches 'Total Tweets'
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on a running twitter campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the start of the running campaign in the Campaign Run Summary section
And the user taps on the view link in the End Date column
And the user enters in a date in the future for end date
And the user enters in 'a' for search for
And the user enters in 100000 for number of winners
custom_expected: Then the user will see the number of winners match the number of total tweets

title: Verify that all timestamps of tweets fall within the range of start date and end date set by the user.
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on a running twitter campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the start of the running campaign in the Campaign Run Summary section
And the user taps on the view link in the End Date column
And the user enters in all the required fields
And taps get tweets
custom_expected: Then all the tweets will fall within  the start date and end date

title: Leaving the number of winners field blank will still return results.
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on a running twitter campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the start of the running campaign in the Campaign Run Summary section
And the user taps on the view link in the End Date column
And enters in an end time
And enters in a search field
And taps get counts
custom_expected: Then there the twitter totals will be populated

title: Results will be returned under Twitter Totals
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on a running twitter campaign page
And there are tweets for that campaign
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the start of the running campaign in the Campaign Run Summary section
And the user taps on the view link in the End Date column
And enters in an end time
And enters in 'a' for search
And enters in 10 for number of winners
And taps get counts
custom_expected:
Then the user will see tweet totals
And the search "Search #4thofjuly for "a" between 07-02-2012 03:21PM and 07-03-2012 04:01PM"

title: Under twitter totals there are 2 columns (total name, total tweets)
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on the run summary for an active twitter campaign
And there are tweets for that campaign
custom_steps:
When the user enters in an end time
And enters in 'a' in the search field
And taps get counts
custom_expected:
Then there will be 2 columns 'Total Name'
And 'Tweet Totals'

title: In total name there are two results (total tweets overall, total tweets matching search terms)
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on the run summary for an active twitter campaign
And there are tweets for that campaign
custom_steps:
When the user enters in an end time
And enters in 'a' in the search field
And taps get counts
custom_expected:
Then there will be 2 results:

Total Tweets Overall
Total Tweets Matching Search Terms

title: The number of total tweets matching search terms should never exceed the number of total tweets
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in with a twitter entitled account
And is on the run summary for an active twitter campaign
And there are tweets for that campaign
custom_steps:
When the user enters in an end time
And enters in 'a' in the search field
And taps get counts
custom_expected: Then the total tweets matching search term will not exceed the number of total tweets
